articles.author: Madhurima Haque
articles.title: Amy Robach breaks silence on alleged cheating scandal with Good Morning America co-host T.J. Holmes - 9Honey Celebrity
articles.description: Good Morning America anchors embroiled in cheating scandal.
articles.content:
Amy Robach, one half of the co-hosts of Good Morning America that are currently embroiled in a cheating scandal, has finally broken her silence on the matter.
When approached by the US Sun yesterday… [+2573 chars]
